messages.message:
<!here>

Just got off the phone with Microsoft, they will give us 6 months of usage for it. They want us to meet with them periodically to receive feedback but it has to be in “pilot” with them and if we decide to move production *all SLA’s for the container do not apply*. They are sending me a text file that we need to replace with the existing license terms in the container… which I’ll send to the infra team @Aaron Tami that we need to replace in the containers we ship (its a manual replacement) we have to send a screenshot of us replacing it with the new terms.

Once we send the email, *that is all they need*, we are good to go for deployment with customers as soon as we send the screenshot with the new terms!

We are good to go with Microsoft OCR on prem with customers!!!
